name: Element Industry
description: In this world, every block has changes of temperature, and there is conversion among solid, liquid and gas. There are varieties of scientific machines (steam engines, diesel engines, etc.) and magic digital circuits to control the completion of automatic control.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7,8,10 Processor: 2.5 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB RAM Storage: 512 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
